arts.ttl: Bittencourt blasts referee after three red cards for Werder
arts.sum: Leonardo Bittencourt was furious at referee Martin Petersen after two Werder players and head coach Ole Werner were sent off towards the end of Friday's win over Mainz.

arts.ttl: Werder Bremen cling on for narrow victory over Mainz
arts.sum: Leonardo Bittencourt scored the only goal of the game as Werder Bremen - who ended the game with nine men - held on for a narrow victory over Mainz in the Matchday 20 opener. Bremen's early pressure paid off when they were awarded a penalty in the 12th minute after Mainz goalkeeper Robin Zentner fouled Schmid.

arts.ttl: Mainz reward Bo Henriksen with new deal: “A motivational genius!”
arts.sum: It was a day of pure unabashed joy yesterday in the Pfälzer capital as FSV Mainz 05 confirmed a new contract for head-coach Bo Henriksen.

arts.ttl: Official | Montpellier leading goalscorer Arnaud Nordin joins Mainz
arts.sum: Another key attacking piece at Montpellier HSC will not be around to help them in their quest to avoid relegation. A day after Akor Adams (24) signed with Sevilla in…

arts.ttl: Mainz announce new contract for Bo Henriksen
arts.sum: Mainz coach Bo Henriksen has extended his contract.

arts.ttl: Werder Bremen vs Mainz preview: A European six-pointer at the Weserstadion
arts.sum: Will Mainz’s momentum lead them to another win, or can Bremen capitalize on their home-field advantage?

arts.ttl: Preview: Werder Bremen vs. Mainz 05 - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Friday's Bundesliga clash between Werder Bremen and Mainz 05, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
